transcripts.speaker: Maya Rodriguez
transcripts.text: Good morning team. Quick standup - let's keep it tight. Chris, what did you finish over the weekend?

transcripts.speaker: Chris Park
transcripts.text: Got the OAuth integration working finally. The refresh token issue is resolved. I'll open a PR this morning. Today I'm starting on the payment flow.

transcripts.speaker: Aisha Patel
transcripts.text: Nice work Chris. I finished the onboarding tutorial designs - sent them over last night. Today I'm polishing the empty states and then moving on to the settings screens.

transcripts.speaker: Chris Park
transcripts.text: Not really. I might need Aisha's input on the payment UI flow later this week, but nothing urgent.

transcripts.speaker: Aisha Patel
transcripts.text: I'm good. Waiting on feedback from Derek about the marketing page designs, but that's not blocking anything.

transcripts.speaker: Maya Rodriguez
transcripts.text: Alright, let's ship. We're two weeks out from launch - keep the momentum going.
